alert.note: Alert for Cass; Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Lancaster; Otoe; Pawnee; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:53AM CDT until July 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... Johnson County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Seward County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Jefferson County in southeastern Nebraska... Western Otoe County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Saline County in southeastern Nebraska... Western Pawnee County in southeastern Nebraska... Gage County in southeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Cass County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 752 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Utica to 2 miles southeast of Swanton to 3 miles northeast of Reynolds, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Beatrice, Tecumseh, Crete, Waverly, Wilber, Hickman, Wymore, Eagle, Bennet, Firth, Adams, Greenwood, Palmyra, De Witt, Cortland, Sterling, Plymouth, Malcolm, and Blue Springs. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 388 and 415. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Lancaster; Otoe; Pawnee; Saline; Seward
